lines.text: Trying to pull a fast one on me, eh? Well he can't outsmart me, because I'm a moron.
So long, jerky! Send me a postcard from Albuquerque! You know, I'm so smart sometimes it almost frightens me.

[On top of the giant's head; the giant puts on his hat]
What is this, a blackout? I didn't hear no sireen.
You think you're pretty C-A-T smart, don't ya?
Look out for that first step. It's a lulu.
Duh, caught ya choppin' up my victory garden, huh?, Well don't try nuttin' funny cuz I got ya covered!

[to the Giant]
Hey come here Gulliver!, I want to tell you something, come here!

[Bugs takes off his glove and slaps him with it]
Duh, duh now why did you wanna go and do that for huh?
You want to fight fair don't you? That means that I challenge you to a duel!
Duh, duel? uh, oh yeah!, okay!
